input:
(declare-const xR Real)
(declare-const yR Real)
(declare-const x Int)
(declare-const y Int)
(declare-const a Int)

(assert (< (+ xR yR) a))
(assert (> (+ x y) a))
(assert (or (= x xR) (< x xR (+ x 1)) (< (- x 1) xR x)))
(assert (or (= y yR) (< y yR (+ y 1)) (< (- y 1) yR y)))
(check-sat)
(get-model)
